Staff Clinician.name: Staff Clinician
Staff Clinician.bio: Registered nurse specializing in Medicare-certified home health care for complex medical needs.

Lead Physical Therapist.name: Lead Physical Therapist
Lead Physical Therapist.bio: Doctor of Physical Therapy helping older adults stay steady, active, and confident at home.

Lead Occupational Therapist.name: Lead Occupational Therapist
Lead Occupational Therapist.bio: Occupational therapist focused on adaptive equipment, home safety, and dementia-friendly routines.

Speech-Language Pathologist.name: Speech-Language Pathologist
Speech-Language Pathologist.bio: Speech therapist providing accessible coaching for speech, voice, and swallowing at home.

Medical Social Worker.name: Medical Social Worker
Medical Social Worker.bio: Licensed clinical social worker guiding families through care planning, resources, and emotional support.

Home Health Aide Supervisor.name: Home Health Aide Supervisor
Home Health Aide Supervisor.bio: Certified nursing assistant trainer helping aides deliver compassionate daily care in the home.

Care Planning Nurse.name: Care Planning Nurse
Care Planning Nurse.bio: Clinical manager translating Medicare rules into clear next steps for patients and families.

Safety Specialist.name: Safety Specialist
Safety Specialist.bio: Durable medical equipment coordinator focused on safe mobility and emergency readiness at home.
